room_title: Escape room "Vacancy" by The Room VB in Virginia Beach
room_description:
You’ve been traveling all night and have become tired. You notice a quaint little motel a minute away and make your way towards it. You can’t find any reviews about it online but decide you can't go any further.  Upon entering, the motel owner welcomes you with open arms.
Slowly but surely you realize that this is, in fact, the crime scene home to many murders you’ve seen on the news. Before you have a chance to leave, the doors lock and an ominous countdown begins… Good luck escaping before the motel owner returns…
